text: StrugglingI have been struggling with thoughts of suicide for   decades   When I was young people told me to keep a journal and exercise my athletic and musical abilities   I went to a great private school in New England  graduation with honors the only way possible  spent   years writing an original thesis that hadn t been written before   During that last half a year my mother got cancer   After she was cancer free many months later  I moved to Asia and taught and went to grad school   I guess I took some time away from reality   I needed it    I went back to the states  got a job  had a boyfriend  married him  got close to his family and mine   Of course there are rifts in the families   What family doesn t have them   But every few months  no matter how happy I seem and no matter how faithful I am in taking my meds  something seems to snap   Yes  I talk to my Dr   It s just a thing I realized tonight that even with some money coming my way I just don t give a shit and right now really would be fine with dying   Sucks
summary: I have been struggling with thoughts of suicide for decades. I went to a great private school in New England graduation with honors. I spent years writing an original thesis that hadn't been written before. I moved to Asia and went to grad school. I had a boyfriend and got close to his family and mine. Even with money coming my way, I don't give a shit and I would be fine with dying.
